scripts.build: dotnet fable src -o build/client --run vite build
scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src -o build/client --runFast vite --open
scripts.test: dotnet fable test -o build/test --define TEST --run web-test-runner build/test/*Test.js --node-resolve
scripts.test:watch: dotnet fable watch test -o build/test --define TEST --run web-test-runner build/test/*Test.js --node-resolve --watch
